'''Germinating Wind''' is [[Sucrose]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
The long section of Sucrose's hair is tied into a low ponytail.

Sucrose's Anemo [[Vision]] is attached as a brooch to her cape collar. She wears thick, white gloves; black-rimmed glasses; a blue corset with a ruffled hem and the [[Knights of Favonius]] crest; and a pair of white boots and black thigh-highs with garter.
